english.segment1: From unknown books come printed discoveries. Enlightenment, recoveries. After the words have been read from memory. The secrets start assembling
english.segment2: Timber colony. Ageless melodies. Timber colony. Books of memories
english.segment3: Horns blow as we greet. In sight of good company. The forest entertains our thoughts. Fond ones that dream of richness and splendor. The wood beckons for us to sing
